configuration.name: Name

addItem.infoText: You can add the Telegraf configuration here

success.add: The new Telegraf configuration was added successfully
success.activate: The Telegraf instance was started with this Telegraf configuration
success.deactivate: The Telegraf instance was stopped with this Telegraf configuration
success.remove: The Telegraf configuration was removed successfully

error.add: Error when adding the new Telegraf configuration
error.activate: Error when starting the Telegraf instance
error.deactivate: Error when stopping the Telegraf instance
error.remove: Error when removing the Telegraf configuration
error.loadConfigFile: Error when loading the Telegraf configuration
error.loadConfigDetails: Error when loading the configuration info
error.save: Error when saving the Telegraf configuration

alertForDelete.title: Do you really want to delete "{{param}}"?
alertForDelete.description: The Telegraf configuration is deleted. This action cannot be undone.

alertForSave.title: Do you want to save the changes made on "{{param}}"?
alertForSave.description: If you click on 'Cancel', the change is lost.

errorLoadAll.message: The Telegraf configurations could not be loaded. Please check the app data and restart the Telegraf app.

configuration.unableToSave: The Telegraf configuration cannot be modified in the 'Running' state.

permissions.noPermissions: You do not have the required permissions

cancelTooltip: Discard the changes on the Telegraf configuration and close the window.
systemState: The system is running in Service mode. Please switch the system to Operation mode and restart Telegraf!
